1.name: Practice Voyage
1.desc_jp: 鎮守府近海を航海し、艦隊の練度を高めよう！
1.desc: Sail around the Naval District to improve the skills of our fleet! (This mission will not yield any bonus rewards)

2.name: Long Distance Training Voyage
2.desc_jp: 外海まで足を延ばし、艦隊の練度を高めよう！
2.desc: Extend our sea legs on a long distance voyage!

3.name: Security Tasks
3.desc_jp: 鎮守府の担当海域をパトロールして、領海の安全を守ろう！
3.desc: Patrol the Naval District to maintain the safety of our waters! (This mission will not yield any bonus rewards)

4.name: Anti-Submarine Alert
4.desc_jp: 水雷戦隊を編成し、領海内を索敵、対潜水警戒任務につこう！
4.desc: Send a Torpedo Squadron to engage an enemy submarine in our waters!

5.name: Maritime Security Missions
5.desc_jp: 輸送船団の安全を図るために、船団に同行して、これを護衛しよう！
5.desc: Escort a convoy out of our waters to ensure it's safety! (This mission will not yield any bonus rewards)

6.name: Anti-Air Exercises
6.desc_jp: 敵艦載機襲来に備えて、対空射撃や回避運動の訓練をしよう！
6.desc: Prepare against an enemy carrier-based attack in a special training session!

7.name: Ceremonial Dress Rehearsal
7.desc_jp: 海の一大ページェント、「観艦式」の予行航海を実施しよう！
7.desc: Perform a dry-run for an upcoming naval review, the "Voyage of the Sea" Ceremony!

8.name: Naval Review
8.desc_jp: 今こそ日頃の訓練の成果を見せるとき！「観艦式」を挙行しよう！
8.desc: Show the results of your training, the "Voyage of the Sea" Ceremony is happening now!

9.name: Tanker Escort Duties
9.desc_jp: 油田地帯から燃料を満載して戻るタンカー船団を護衛しよう！
9.desc: Escort a Tanker Convoy carrying a great supply of fuel back from the oil fields!

10.name: Attack Force Recon Missions
10.desc_jp: 水上偵察機搭載艦などを活用し、敵艦隊の動向を探れ！
10.desc: Utilise a Seaplane Reconnaissance Aircraft Carrier to gather Intel on the enemy fleet!

11.name_jp: ボーキサイト輸送任務
11.name: Bauxite Transport Missions
11.desc_jp: 資源集積地から母港に、ボーキサイトを輸送しよう！
11.desc: Transport bauxite from a land-integrated resource back to home-port!

12.name: Resource Transportation Missions
12.desc_jp: 資源国から輸入される資源を母港へ護衛し、無事輸送を完了しよう！
12.desc: A convoy carrying goods imported from resource-rich countries is heading to home-port. Send out an escort to ensure it's safety!

13.name: Rat Transportation Strategy
13.desc_jp: 快速の駆逐艦を集中運用して、激戦の諸島へ物資を輸送しよう！
13.desc: Send out a fleet of Destroyers at night in an operation to transport supplies closer to the front lines!

14.name: Siege-Corps Withdrawal Strategies
14.desc_jp: 機動力のある小艦艇部隊を結集し、包囲下の部隊を収容しよう！
14.desc: Our troops are under siege! Send in a squadron our smallest, fastest vessels to get them out of there!

15.name: Decoy Task Force Assistance Operations
15.desc_jp: 敵機動部隊の戦力を誘引する空母を含む囮部隊で、主力艦隊を支援しよう！
15.desc: The Main Fleet is in dire need of assistance! Send out some decoy troops, including an Aircraft Carrier, to attract the enemy task force's attention!

16.name: Fleet Battle Support Strategy
16.desc_jp: 有力な艦隊を編成し、敵の背後側面を奇襲、主力の艦隊決戦を援護しよう！
16.desc: Organise a powerful fleet and perform a sneak attack behind enemy forces to assist the Main Fleet!

17.name: Enemy Territory Reconnaissance Operations
17.desc_jp: 精鋭の水雷戦隊を編成し、北方海域の敵情勢を強行偵察せよ！
17.desc: Send an elite Torpedo Squadron into northern waters to analyse the movement patterns of our enemy! (This mission will not yield any bonus rewards)

18.name: Aircraft Transport Strategy
18.desc_jp: 有力な「航空母艦」多数を配備した艦隊を編成、前線に航空機を輸送せよ！
18.desc: Deploy a fleet consisting of numerous Aircraft Carriers to transport planes to the front lines!

19.name: Northern Offensive Operations
19.desc_jp: 練度の高い「航空戦艦」複数を基幹とした、強行輸送船団を出航させよ！
19.desc: Set sail to the North with a fleet of Aircraft Carriers and Battleships to defend our vital convoys from enemy forces!

20.name: Submarine Patrol
20.desc_jp: 潜水艦とその支援艦艇によって構成された艦隊で、北方海域の哨戒任務に当たれ！
20.desc: Send a fleet of Submarines and Support Vessels to patrol northern waters!

21.name: Northern Rat Transportation Strategy
21.desc_jp: 水雷戦隊にドラム缶(輸送用)を積載し、北方方面の友軍への糧食補給を図れ！
21.desc: Send out a Torpedo Squadron at night in an operation to transport supplies to allied ground forces in the North! Use Drum Canisters to carry rations and other supplies!

22.name: Fleet Exercises
22.desc_jp: 練度を向上させるための艦隊演習を行う。(資源獲得目的の遠征ではありません)
22.desc: Perform some exercises around the Naval District to improve the skills of our fleet! (This mission will not yield any bonus rewards)

23.name: Aviation Battleship Exercises
23.desc_jp: 練度の高い「航空戦艦」複数を基幹とした艦隊による総合演習を実施せよ！
23.desc: Implement two Aviation Battleships into our general practice program to assist with training our fleet! (This mission will not yield any bonus rewards)

24.name: Guard the North Sea Route
24.desc_jp: 練度の高い軽巡が率いる精鋭の護衛艦隊で、北方航路の海上護衛を実施せよ！
24.desc: With a Light Cruiser as the flagship, deploy an Elite Escort Fleet on a maritime escort mission along the Northern Sea Route!

25.name: Trade-Route Destruction Strategy
25.desc_jp: 快速かつ打撃力のある重巡を中心とした艦隊によって、敵後方補給線を遮断せよ!
25.desc: Send out a fleet containing the strength of a fast and powerful Heavy Cruiser to intercept the enemy rear supply lines! (This mission will not yield any bonus rewards)

26.name: Bombing Campaign on the Enemy Home-Port
26.desc_jp: 敵潜水艦の哨戒線を長躯突破し、空母を伴った有力な機動部隊で敵母港を叩け！
26.desc: The enemy is currently the dominant force and has recently increased the size of their submarine patrol lines. Send out an Aircraft Carrier to teach them a lesson!

27.name: Submarine Commerce Destruction Strategy
27.desc_jp: 潜水艦2隻以上を伴う艦隊で敵後方へ進出、通商破壊作戦を実施せよ！
27.desc: Deploy a fleet of two submarines to seek and destroy trade ships entering the enemy's home-port via the rear!

28.name: Western Sea Blockade Operation
28.desc_jp: 潜水艦3隻以上で構成される艦隊で、西方海域の敵水上艦の活動を封鎖せよ!
28.desc: Deploy a fleet of three submarines to blockade enemy ships returning to the Western sea area of activity!

29.name: Submarine Dispatch Exercises
29.desc_jp: 潜水艦3隻以上で構成される艦隊を編成、長距離派遣の演習を実施せよ！
29.desc: Deploy a fleet of three submarines to perform in formation and long-range staffing exercises!

30.name: Submarine Dispatch Operations
30.desc_jp: 潜水艦4隻以上で構成される艦隊を編成し、遠方の友軍勢力との連絡を試みよ！
30.desc: Deploy a fleet of four submarines to battle alongside friendly forces far away!

31.name: Contacting Foreign Vessels
31.desc_jp: 潜水艦4隻以上で構成される艦隊を編成・派遣し、海外艦との邂逅を試みよ！
31.desc: Deploy a fleet of four submarines to meet up with a foreign ship in a friendly meet-up!

32.name: Seafaring Training
32.desc_jp: 練習巡洋艦を旗艦とした練習艦隊で遠洋練習航海を実施、基礎練度向上に努めよ！
32.desc: Bring the Training Vessel Katori on a special training voyage to improve the skills and abilities of your fleet!

33.name: Vanguard Support Missions (1)
33.desc_jp: 南方海域へ支援艦隊を出撃させ、主力艦隊の進撃を援護せよ！(要:駆逐2隻)
33.desc: Send out a support fleet to the Southern Ocean to defend against an enemy invasion fleet!(Sortie-Support Expedition)

34.name: Vanguard Support Missions (2)
34.desc_jp: 南方海域へ決戦支援を行う別動隊を出撃させ、主力艦隊の艦隊決戦を援護せよ！(要:駆逐2隻)
34.desc: The enemy has brought in very powerful forces! Send out another fleet into the Southern Ocean to assist against the invasion! (Sortie-Support Expedition)

35.name: MO Operations
35.desc_jp: 空母2隻を基幹とするMO機動部隊を出撃させ、南方海域の制海権を確保せよ！
35.desc: Send out an MO Task Force featuring an Armoured Aircraft Carrier to secure the Southern Ocean once and for all!

36.name: Water Base Construction
36.desc_jp: 水上機母艦2隻を含む艦隊を編成し、南方海域に哨戒用の水上機基地を建設せよ！
36.desc: We need a base in the Southern Ocean to make patrols easier! Send out a Seaplane Tender amongst your fleet to aid in organising and constructing the project!

37.name: Tokyo Express (1)
37.desc_jp: 水雷戦隊にドラム缶(輸送用)を満載し、南方方面友軍への鼠輸送作戦を遂行せよ！
37.desc: Send out a Torpedo Squadron at night in an operation to transport supplies to friendly faces in the South! Use Drum Canisters to carry rations and other supplies!

38.name: Tokyo Express (2)
38.desc_jp: 水雷戦隊にドラム缶(輸送用)を可能な限り満載し、南方鼠輸送作戦を続行せよ！
38.desc: Send out a Torpedo Squadron at night with as many supplies as possible! Continue south with Drum Canisters packed to the brim in this special Rat Transport Operation!

39.name: Deep-Sea Submarine Warfare
39.desc_jp: 潜水母艦と多数の潜水艦による遠洋潜水艦作戦を実施、敵戦力の漸減に努めよ！
39.desc: Our intelligence says the enemy submarine forces are dwindling. Conduct a deep-sea battle against them with a fleet of Submarines and a Submarine Tender!

40.name: Seaplane Delivery on the Front Lines
40.desc_jp: 複数の水上機母艦を有する軽巡を旗艦とした艦隊で、水上機の前線輸送を実施せよ！
40.desc: Assemble a fleet with a Light Cruiser as the flagship and multiple Seaplane Tenders. Deploy them on a transport mission to the front lines!

100.name: Logistic Reinforcement
100.desc_jp:
港湾施設強化と兵站備蓄施設拡充
に協力し、補給体制を強化せよ！
100.desc:
港湾施設強化と兵站備蓄施設拡充
に協力し、補給体制を強化せよ！

101.name: Strait Security Operation
101.desc_jp:
海防艦や駆逐艦による、沿岸警備
部隊で、海峡警備を実施しよう！
101.desc:
海防艦や駆逐艦による、沿岸警備
部隊で、海峡警備を実施しよう！

102.name: Extended Anti-Submarine Alert
102.desc_jp:
高練度の対潜部隊を展開、敵潜を
制圧し、航路の安全を確保せよ！
102.desc:
高練度の対潜部隊を展開、敵潜を
制圧し、航路の安全を確保せよ！

125.name: General Vanguard Support Missions
125.desc_jp: 支援艦隊を出撃させ、主力艦隊の進撃を援護せよ！(要:駆逐2隻)
125.desc: Deploy a support fleet in an avant-garde support mission! (Sortie-Support Expedition)

126.name: General Fleet Battle Support Missions
126.desc_jp: 主力艦隊支援を行う別動隊を出撃させ、艦隊決戦を援護せよ！(要:駆逐2隻)
126.desc: Deploy a support fleet to assist our main forces battle out against the enemy! (Sortie-Support Expedition)

141.name: General Vanguard Support Missions
141.desc_jp: 支援艦隊を出撃させ、主力艦隊の進撃を援護せよ！(要:駆逐2隻)
141.desc: Deploy a support fleet to assist in defending against the enemy invasion force! (Sortie-Support Expedition)

142.name: General Fleet Battle Support Missions
142.desc_jp: 主力艦隊支援を行う別動隊を出撃させ、艦隊決戦を援護せよ！(要:駆逐2隻)
142.desc: Deploy a support fleet to assist our main forces battle out against an enemy boss! (Sortie-Support Expedition)

149.name: General Vanguard Support Missions
149.desc_jp: 支援艦隊を出撃させ、主力艦隊の進撃を援護せよ！(要:駆逐2隻)
149.desc: Deploy a support fleet to assist in defending against the enemy invasion force! (Sortie-Support Expedition))

150.name: General Fleet Battle Support Missions
150.desc_jp: 主力艦隊支援を行う別動隊を出撃させ、艦隊決戦を援護せよ！(要:駆逐2隻)
150.desc: Deploy a support fleet to assist our main forces battle out against an enemy boss! (Sortie-Support Expedition)

B1.name_jp: 南西方面航空偵察作戦
B1.name: South Western Air Reconnaissance Operation

B2.name: Enemy Harbor Assault Counter Attack Operation

B3.name_jp: 南西諸島離島哨戒作戦
B3.name: Nansei Island Remote Island Patrolling Operation

B4.name_jp: 南西諸島離島防衛作戦
B4.name: Nansei Island Remote Island Defense Operation

B5.name: Nansei Island Search and Destroy Mission

E1.name_jp: ラバウル方面艦隊進出
E1.name: Rabaul District Fleet Advance

45.name_jp: ボーキサイト船団護衛
45.name: Bauxite Convoy Escort
